channel.title: How To Let Someone Join Server
channel.description: I created an hamachi server, and now my friend wants to join it, but i don't know how! would someone plz tell me! and not just say; yes follow this tutorial with an link, cuz when i follow that link, i get another link etc.

item.title: How To Let Someone Join Server
item.dc:creator: @inyuasha inyuasha
item.description:
@inyuasha wrote:

well first you need to make a network on ham [br][size=1]Posted on: September 30, 2007, 02:27:19 AM[/size][hr]the lil triangle will help you make 1 id advise no pass but if u put on the list it might stop some crashers not sure
